name: Rosy Radish Home Fries
ingredients: 16 ounces radishes, washed, dried and trimmed

instructions.ja: ラディッシュを洗って水気を拭き取り、へたを取る

instructions.en: Quarter smaller radishes and cut larger ones into eighths
instructions.sk: Menšie reďkovky rozštvrťte a väčšie nakrájajte na osminy
instructions.ja: 小さいラディッシュは4等分に、大きいものは8等分に切る
小さな玉ねぎをさいの目切りにする

instructions.en: Heat butter and oil in a medium skillet
instructions.sk: Rozohrejte maslo a olej v stredne veľkej panvici
instructions.ja: 中サイズのフライパンでバターと油を熱する

instructions.en: Add radishes and onions to the skillet
instructions.sk: Pridajte reďkovky a cibuľu do panvice
instructions.ja: フライパンにラディッシュと玉ねぎを加える

instructions.en: Cover the pan, turn heat to low, and cook for 5-10 minutes
instructions.sk: Prikryte panvicu, stíšte plameň a varte 5-10 minút
instructions.ja: 蓋をして弱火で5〜10分間調理する

instructions.en: Uncover, turn heat to medium and cook until nicely browned, stirring occasionally
instructions.sk: Odkryte, zvýšte plameň na stredný a varte do zlatohneda, občas premiešajte
instructions.ja: 蓋を取り、中火にして時々かき混ぜながらきつね色になるまで炒める

instructions.en: Season with salt and pepper to taste
instructions.sk: Ochuťte soľou a korením podľa chuti
instructions.ja: 塩コショウで味を調える
